name: Cognitive Coffee
description:
You wake up and don't remember anything, but there's a girl in front of you that knows exactly what's going on...  As you play the conversation may take you somewhere you don't expect... Do you two know each other?

This a finished game that's meant to be an interquel (midquel? prequel?) to an upcoming game I will be working on featuring the same characters. Get to meet them and delve into their dynamic while I work on the next game lol (Which I swear will explain way more)

(My first serious game, second game ever made)

For mature audiences only! TW: Death, swearing, sus things and general no bueno
